ingredientsNeeded: ¼ cup flour (whole wheat or regular)
steps: Dredge chicken: Season chicken with salt, pepper. Lightly coat in flour.
Sauté: In a skillet over medium-high heat, warm olive oil. Cook chicken ~3–4 minutes per side until golden. Remove.
Sauce: Add broth, lemon juice, capers to skillet. Scrape up bits from the pan; simmer a few minutes.
Return chicken: Let simmer in sauce ~2–3 minutes to finish cooking. Adjust seasoning.

ingredientsNeeded: ½ cup ricotta or cream cheese (light)
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix filling: Combine spinach, ricotta, mozzarella (if using), and seasonings.
Stuff chicken: Butterfly each breast, spoon filling inside, secure with toothpicks if needed.
Bake: Place in a baking dish, lightly drizzle with oil or use cooking spray. Bake ~20–25 minutes until chicken is 165°F inside.

ingredientsNeeded: 1 lb chicken breasts, cubed or shredded
steps: Sauté chicken: In a pot with a little oil, cook chicken until lightly browned.
Add veggies: Onions, carrots, celery. Cook a few minutes.
Broth: Pour in broth, add thyme, salt, pepper.
Simmer: ~20–25 minutes until veggies are tender.
Brown beef: In a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat. Drain fat if needed.
Add potatoes: Stir in diced potatoes (and bell pepper if using). Season with salt, pepper, paprika.
Cook: Cover and cook ~10–15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are tender (add a splash of water or broth if too dry).
Serve hot.
Form patties: Divide beef into 4 patties. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder.
Cook: Grill or pan-fry ~4–5 minutes per side (depending on thickness and desired doneness).
Assemble: Toast buns if desired. Add toppings. Serve with a side of roasted veggies or salad.

recipes.recipeName: Baked Whole Wheat Pasta with Veggies
ingredientsNeeded: 8 oz whole wheat pasta (penne, ziti, etc.)
2 cups mixed vegetables (eggplant, zucchini, or mushrooms, chopped)
steps: Cook pasta: According to package directions. Drain.
Sauté veggies: In a skillet, lightly cook chopped veggies with a bit of oil, salt, pepper.
Combine: Mix pasta, sauce, veggies, half the cheese in a baking dish.
Top: Sprinkle remaining cheese on top.
Bake: At 375°F (190°C) for ~15–20 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
